data.title: Salamanca Facts
data.meta_description: Spanish Town Guides - A complete guide to Spain, Madrid, Malaga, Salamanca, Sevilla and Granada - Including information about accommodation, useful numbers, holidays, history, museums, monuments, attractions, sport, maps, restaurants, nightlife and golf courses in Salamanca
data.text:
Spain Forum

Get advice, ask and discuss topics with your fellow travelers at Salamanca.

Classified Ads

Buying or selling something? Offering a service or in need of one? Check out our classifieds.

Survaysa & Polls

Surveys on various aspects of Spain and Spanish life. Make your voice heard!

Spain News
